DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate compare safety efficacy non-invasive 1064nm laser 940nm diode , disruption subcutaneous adipose tissue skin tightening .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Safety Efficacy Non-Invasive Disruption Fat Skin Tightening Using 1064nm 940nm Wavelengths
DOC.criteria: Nonsmoking subject age 2055 year age present excess abdominal tissue ( fat skin ) , candidate abdominoplasty procedure willing allow use device skin Subjects ( Group 2 3 ) allow excess skin remove part abdominoplasty send laboratory analysis Understand accept obligation associate procedure Subjects Fitzpatrick skin type I VI . Subjects ( Group 2 3 ) willing consent participate study ask undergo treatment , elasticity ultrasound measurement , outline group define section 6.0 . Subjects must agree maintain diet exercise regime throughout study Any previous liposuction/liposculpture type procedure abdominal area past 6 month A history allergic reaction medication anesthesia require procedure A history thrombophlebitis A history acute infection A history heart failure Received anticipate receive antiplatelets , anticoagulant , thrombolytic , vitamin E antiinflammatories within 2 week pre treatment Intolerance anesthesia medication prescribed procedure . Any medical condition , , investigator 's opinion would interfere patient 's participation study Taking medication photosensitive A history keloid formation A study subject must pregnant pregnant last 3 month The physician right make determination eligibility he/she determines base standard care
